titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain crystal vases and drinking glasses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/14/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2001, the duty on vases and drinking glasses of barium crystal valued over $5 each, whether or not cut or engraved.
